The Azerbaijani people are rightly proud that the first democratic republic in the Muslim world was created in Azerbaijan.
Azerbaijan lived only two years as an independent country. However, great work has been done over the years.
In those years democratic institutions were formed, great work was done in the field of army building, women were given the right to vote.
A solid foundation for the future successful development of Azerbaijan has been created.
If independence was not achieved in 1920, I am absolutely convinced that today Azerbaijan would be one of the richest countries in the world.
In the 1970s, rapid development in Azerbaijan began.
In those years, our industrial potential was created, especially in the oil industry. It is a great support for us today.
The stability and development in 1993-2003 will remain as a period that will ensure that Azerbaijan remains as an independent nation.
Just as the result of Heydar Aliyev's decisiveness, courage, experience, outlook and thoughtful policy (cont) http://t.co/BCCU2cUVkG
Today, we conduct our activities within the framework of a defined strategy and develop Azerbaijan.
The deepening political and economic reforms in the country today represent Azerbaijan as a powerful regional state.
Over the past decade we have been deepening reforms, mobilizing our society, and in the society of Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/vpe0HUctjR
Our position is based on justice, international law. Our principled position gives us added respect both in the region and in the world.
We declare our intentions, our policies, and our steps are the continuation of our policies. (cont) http://t.co/l2q9Je0r9f
Independent domestic and foreign policy, our strong army is the basis of our independence, the basis.
Economic independence, energy and transport security, effective use of its geographical location (cont) http://t.co/Je26ADIyrH
We will continue to maintain stability in Azerbaijan.
The key condition for ensuring the stability is the unity between the people and power. That's it.
Azerbaijan is one of the rare countries today, and there is no disagreement on the main issues around society.
Our main goal is to turn Azerbaijan into a stronger state, to improve the welfare of the Azerbaijani people.
We will continue to pursue our principal line of internal policy.
The reforms will deepen. Development of democracy, protection of human rights, free society (cont) http://t.co/0N3fUiYkwZ
Today, every patriot is proud of being a citizen of modern and powerful state like Azerbaijan.
That state does not impose its citizens. The state that stands behind its citizens.
Establishing a modern state over national values ​​is one of the aspects that make us different today.
Our foreign policy initiatives provide excellent results. We prefer bilateral formats in foreign policy.
We are trying to develop bilateral relations with the countries of the region as well as with other countries.
Relations with all neighboring countries, with the exception of Armenia, have equal rights, mutual respect and respect (cont) http://t.co/8YxdfioWJW
In the future, cooperation with neighboring countries will remain a priority for our foreign policy.
At the initiative of Azerbaijan, several trilateral formats have already been created.
The first trilateral meeting of Azerbaijani, Turkish and Turkmen foreign ministers was held in Baku. We attach great importance to it
Azerbaijan-Turkey-Georgia, Azerbaijan-Turkey-Iran trilateral formats have been in the previous period.
These formats are already operating and Azerbaijan is in all three formats.
We also actively participate in international organizations.
Our position in the UN, the Non-Aligned Movement, the Organization of Islamic Cooperation is strong and we play a very active role in these institutions.
@EU_Commission meeting today. Great to have colleagues back from electoral leave. We missed them! http://t.co/qAFZeijAs8
There are good opportunities and prospects for cooperation with the Council of Europe. We are already chairing the Council of Europe.
The development of democracy in Europe, strengthening the fight against corruption, and our fight against Islamophobia will be even more effective.
All necessary diplomatic and legal bases for settlement of the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict have been laid.
The conflict can only be resolved on the basis of the norms and principles of international law.
International law supports and advocates our position.
The territorial integrity of Azerbaijan has never been and will not be the subject of negotiations.
The conflict should be resolved on the basis of four UN Security Council resolutions.
We hear from the co-chairing countries many times about confidence-building measures.
The most important confidence-building measure is the withdrawal of Armenian occupation forces from the Azerbaijani territories.
Azerbaijan has already solved energy security issues for a long time. It contributes to the energy security of other countries.
The main project we are facing today is the TANAP project. TANAP is a project that changes the region's energy map.
Azerbaijan is the main shareholder of this project, the main initiator and the main implementer.
I am confident that this global project will be implemented in time - until 2018.
